  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/883</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/883</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com s'accentua la e?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you accentuate the e in Catalan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie betonen Sie das e auf katalanisch?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment accentuez-vous le e dans le catalan ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você accentuate o e no catalan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come accentuate la e nel catalan?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τονίζετε το ε στα καταλανικά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre l'accentuació de la e oberta i la e tancada. Conté una presentació informativa, activitats d'autoavaluació, pràctiques i un enllaç per ampliar la informació. Les activitats es poden imprimir i consultar al portal.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on accentuating the open e and closed e. It includes an introduction, self-assessment activities, practice exercises, and a link for further information. The activities can be printed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Andorra</string>
            <string language="en">Andorra</string>
            <string language="es">Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua catalana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fonologia</string>
            <string language="en">phonology</string>
            <string language="es">fonología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
dem Betonen des geöffneten e und des geschlossenen e. Er 
schließt eine Einleitung, Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten, Übungen und 
ein Link für weitere Informationen ein. Die Aktivitäten 
können gedruckt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
accentuer le e ouvert et e fermé. Elle inclut une introduction,
des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, des exercices pratiques, et un 
lien pour de plus amples informations. Les activités peuvent 
être imprimées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em accentuating o
e aberto e e closed. Inclui uma introdução, atividades do 
self-assessment, exercícios de prática, e uma ligação para uma 
informação mais adicional. As atividades podem ser imprimidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sull'accentuazione la e aperta e della e chiusa. Include 
un'introduzione, le attività di valutazione di se stesso, le 
esercitazioni di pratica e un collegamento per ulteriori informazioni.
Le attività possono essere stampate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στον 
τονισμός του ανοικτού ε και του κλειστού ε. Περιλαμβάνει μια
εισαγωγή, τις δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης, τις ασκήσεις 
πρακτικής, και μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες πληροφορίες. Οι 
δραστηριότητες μπορούν να τυπωθούν.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phonology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Andorre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phonologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fonologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Andorra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">phonology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανδόρρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλανική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φωνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
